Question
========

Suppose it is given that for a given patient population, the hemoglobin (Hb) level is normally distributed with μ = 13.6 and σ = 1.1. We randomly draw one person from this population. How high should the Hb of this person be at most to belong to the lowest 15% of the population? belong?

Answerlist
----------

* 11.4165
* 12.0929
* 12.4599
* 12.4763

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 11.4165: Incorrect
* 12.0929: Incorrect
* 12.4599: Correct
* 12.4763: Incorrect
